md:
giải nghĩa từ "plenty" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. **Plenty** (noun) - Nhiều, Đủ
	* Meaning: A large or sufficient amount of something.
	* Example: "There's plenty of food in the fridge, so don't worry about going hungry."
	* Related words: abundant, ample, sufficient, enough
2. **Plenty** (adverb) - Rất, Đủ
	* Meaning: To a great or sufficient extent.
	* Example: "I've been working plenty hard on this project, so I'm confident it will be a success."
	* Related words: very, extremely, highly, sufficiently

Note: In both cases, "plenty" implies a sense of abundance or sufficiency, but the noun form refers to a quantity of something, while the adverb form describes the extent or degree of something.

  1. Plenty (noun) - Nhiều, Đủ

    • Example: "There's plenty of food in the fridge, so don't worry about going hungry."
    • Related words: abundant, ample, sufficient, enough
  2. Plenty (adverb) - Rất, Đủ
    • Meaning: To a great or sufficient extent.
    • Example: "I've been working plenty hard on this project, so I'm confident it will be a success."
    • Related words: very, extremely, highly, sufficiently

Note: In both cases, "plenty" implies a sense of abundance or sufficiency, but the noun form refers to a quantity of something, while the adverb form describes the extent or degree of something.
